entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:31 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 9:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
